main.java.vlashchevskyi.exam.concurrency

Class ConcurrentSwitcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.vlashchevskyi.exam.concurrency.ConcurrentSwitcher

  • public class ConcurrentSwitcher
extends java.lang.Object
    ConcurrentSwitcher class defines type of object dependent on threading mode state. It includes RequestWrapper and OverlapResolver objects.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int THRESHOLD_OF_CONCURRENCE
      The constant defines effective threshold for multithreading mode and represents amount of booking requests are going to be handled.

    • Method Summary

      Gets an overlap resolver according to multithreading mode.

      Gets an wrapper according to multithreading mode.
